page.title: 05SCHOOL SPORTS DAY
page.content: The five schools which took part in the sports on Sawley village green on 17th,July 1985 were Galphay,North Stainley,Sawley,Sharow and Skelton. Parents brought the children in cars. Children were divided into five teams with some from each school in every team.We started with the infant flat races.When they had finished the real fun started.There were 5 games.They were called Shot put,Bean bags in bucket,Goal shooting and Two jumps.We had to do each game in turn.Juniors in each team did all the games first then the infants followed.One person from each team would take a score card to the scoreboard at the end of each game.We all had a drink at the interval.then the wining team did a lap of honour.There followed more flat races for the juniors and two for parents.
